entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 1:35 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: WSW 41 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
